long_description: Weighing in at 6 oz., the REI Packable Fleet jacket offers reliable protection from chilly weather. Tightly woven polyester fends off wind without making you sweat, and a Durable Water Repellent finish protects from light rain. Fabric blocks gusts as high as 40 m.p.h. Mesh panels under arms and at cuffs enhance ventilation. Jacket packs into front zip pocket. Pocket features a media port for your headphones that routes through jacket and out through a port in the collar; design reduces annoying cord bounce when jogging. Too hot to run with the jacket zipped up? Simply unzip and attach a small rip-and-stick tab across chest to enhance ventilation and maintain a comfortable fit while running. Reflective loop at upper back enhances visibility and hangs jacket out to dry. Additional reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The REI Packable Fleet jacket provides a full range of motion with an active fit.
short_description: Weighing in at 6 oz., the REI Packable Fleet jacket offers reliable protection from chilly weather.
